• Mega Miner Online is a multiplayer mining game with procedurally generated worlds.
  • Features include resource mining, crafting, trading, and real-time multiplayer interaction.
  • Supports both desktop and mobile controls with a virtual D-pad and action buttons.
  • Includes a shop system for upgrades, fuel, and items, plus a cloud save system.
  • Has admin controls for server management and a dynamic day/night cycle with weather effects.

Mega Miner Online is a multiplayer mining game featuring procedurally generated worlds where players can mine resources, craft items, trade with others, and explore together in real-time. The game supports both desktop and mobile controls, includes a shop system for upgrades, and features admin controls for server management. Players can save their progress to the cloud and enjoy a dynamic day/night cycle with weather effects.
